author: jefft
msg: Remove the hardcoded xerces.jar property. It was pointing to a nonexistent
tools/lib/xerces.jar, causing the build to break

author: jefft
msg: - Give LICENSE and README a .txt suffix, for the benefit of Windows users.

author: jefft
msg: - Give BUILDING, LICENSE, README and TODO a .txt suffix, for the benefit of
- Fix the 'src-dist' target so that BUILDING.txt is copied too.

author: jefft
msg: Changes to make the source distribution buildable by mortals:
* Revert from Ant 1.5 to Ant 1.4 syntax
* Remove the line that excluded lib/logkit*.jar from the classpath. As part of
creating the source distribution, tools/ext/logkit.jar is copied to lib/, so
we need it in there or the source distribution won't build.

author: bloritsch
msg: fix issues with omitting docs from binary dist and inadequate information in BUILDING.
